title: Instagram releases Boomerang because GIFs are taking over the world
text:
Instagram releases Boomerang because GIFs are taking over the world 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Instagram, the app that makes all of our lives look better than they are, has released Boomerang, a standalone app that allows you to take f...
